pois.name: Starting City
pois.summary: A bustling hub for rumors, riddles, and supplies.
pois.lore: Merchants whisper of a Velvet Court to the south and a lake that saps strength to the northeast.

npcs.name: Mara the Hawker
npcs.note: Buys curios; pays extra for items from Redspire.

hooks: A sealed letter mentions 'the brothers' waiting on the road tavern.
An old riddle points to a district where 'desire wears a crown'.

pois.name: Wayside Tavern
pois.summary: Just outside the city. Whispers of two mysterious brothers.
pois.lore: Two travelers speak in parables: one of mercy, one of judgment. The barkeep keeps a ledger of favors owed.

npcs.name: Brother of Dawn
npcs.note: Kind eyes; asks what you protect.

npcs.name: Brother of Dusk
npcs.note: Cold smile; asks what you would sacrifice.

hooks: Choose: aid a caravan (safe) or chase a bandit (risky) — both shape later trials.

pois.name: The Velvet Court
pois.summary: Trial of Lust. Glamour, temptation, and hidden claws.
pois.lore: Perfumed lanterns, music like silk. Promises of power if you surrender a name.

npcs.name: The Madame
npcs.note: Smiles like a blade; knows every desire.

hooks: Resist temptation to claim a sigil needed for the Lake.
If you bargain, gain a boon but mark a debt that returns later.

pois.name: The Draining Lake
pois.summary: Trial of Sloth. Strength ebbs the longer you linger.
pois.lore: Water like glass, time like honey. Every choice delayed becomes a chain.
hooks: Defeat the Warden of Stillness before exhaustion sets in.
Cure requires the sigil from the Velvet Court — or accept a lasting scar.
